name: Infopro Learning
description: Infopro Learning is an award-winning workforce transformation consultancy that unlocks the potential of people to power business performance. As a global leader in talent development and managed learning services, Infopro Learning offers solutions that support the entire lifecycle of learning, from strategy to talent sourcing. Our approach is anchored in innovation, agility, and a distinctive performance driven design that provides a clear, measurable roadmap for achieving organizational objectives and delivering quantifiable outcomes.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Powering performance and unlocking potential worldwide.
ShortDescription: Unlock Potential: Transforming L&D Outcomes for Business Success

Highlights.name: Remote First Learning
Highlights.description: Adapting to a digital learning ecosystem for over 50% of the workforce planning to stay remote.

Highlights.name: Leading Remote Teams
Highlights.description: New leadership playbooks are essential for managing remote teams effectively, beyond traditional methods.

Highlights.name: Using Analytics to Improve Engagement
Highlights.description: Measuring how people engage with your business is the first step in improving it.

enhanced_description: Infopro Learning is an award-winning global workforce transformation consultancy and a leader in talent development and managed learning services. They provide innovative, agile, and performance-driven solutions designed to support the entire learning lifecycle, from strategy to talent sourcing, with a clear focus on delivering measurable outcomes. Their services help organizations power business performance by unlocking human potential, accelerating skill development, and improving learning efficiency. Key initiatives include building resilient leaders, achieving sales targets, creating L&D efficiencies, and fostering an agile culture. They specifically address modern workforce challenges such as remote-first learning, developing new leadership playbooks for remote teams, and leveraging analytics to improve employee engagement.
competitive_advantages: Global leadership in talent development and managed learning services
Performance-driven design with measurable roadmaps and quantifiable outcomes
Supports the entire lifecycle of learning, from strategy to talent sourcing
Focus on innovation and agility in learning solutions
Specialized expertise in remote-first learning and leading remote teams
Emphasis on using analytics to improve engagement
roi_benefits: Unlocks the potential of people to power business performance
Provides a clear, measurable roadmap for achieving organizational objectives and delivering quantifiable outcomes
scalability_features: Capable of supporting the entire lifecycle of learning for diverse organizations
